title: cafter
author: cafter
content: All softwares like adobe, microsoft office, FLstudio, etc are all paid software, all they are very important to learn like for jobs, etcmy question is downloading these softwares or movies from torrent site are harmful ?

comments.author: nicolas222
comments.body: Yes, pirated software and movies can be harmful. Pirated software and movies are illegal and can contain viruses and spyware that can slow down or damage your computer systems. Piracy is a form of copyright infringement, and it can lead to legal consequences for individuals and businesses. Therefore, it is recommended to avoid using pirated software and movies to protect your computer systems and avoid legal issues.

comments.author: rahulzx
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on April 06, 2023, 07:10:43 AMAll softwares like adobe, microsoft office, FLstudio, etc are all paid software, all they are very important to learn like for jobs, etcmy question is downloading these softwares or movies from torrent site are harmful ?Yes, recently one of my friends faced ransomware attack as he unzip the file to get key to apply the activation, then screen display that Pay 1000$ worth BTC to this address to get your pc back to you, we were so upset, then he decide to format his pc , with his valuable academic data. So don't use unprofessional resources to apply software to your pc mate.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Well this is something I always would do when a new song came out or a new movie that I want to watch. I would simply visit a torrent site and download free copies to my computer not realizing that one day I would download a huge software virus. Let me tell you it was not easy and it sure was not cheap to save my computer. Since that incident, I have now learned my lesson to just pay a trusted streaming service to watch my movies or hear my favorite music. I do not pirate software anymore, it is a risk with much unknown malware or virus that is simply too costly. Fixing this problem is expensive and time-consuming and nothing but headaches. If you think about it someone can be spying on your activity and even steal important information.
